item.title: Using AWK to extract generated file from jekyll-compose
item.description: Recently, I have been using jekyll to make notes. I use jekyll-compose gem to create post using command line. However, the auto open generated file features isn’t working in my machine after the setup. After a few times on manually opening the generated files in vim, I decided to write a quick shell script to solve this issue.
